languages.text: {n}Маражай окидывает Винтерскейла ленивым взглядом.{/n} "Я помню те времена, когда эта планетка еще служила развлечением для кабалов. Когда веселье иссякло вместе с визжащим мясом, иссяк и наш интерес".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай окидывает Винтерскейла ленивым взглядом.{/n} "Я помню те времена, когда эта планетка еще служила развлечением для кабалов. Когда веселье иссякло вместе с визжащим мясом, иссяк и наш интерес".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай окидывает Винтерскейла ленивым взглядом.{/n} "Я помню те времена, когда эта планетка еще служила развлечением для кабалов. Когда веселье иссякло вместе с визжащим мясом, иссяк и наш интерес".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives Winterscale a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a Kabal toy. When the planet ran out of squealing meat, so did our interest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira a Calligos con condescendencia.{/n} «Recuerdo una época en la que este planeta era una simple fuente de entretenimiento para las Kábalas. En cuanto se acabó la carne que chillaba, ocurrió lo mismo con nuestro interés».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira a Winterscale con condescendencia.{/n} «Recuerdo una época en la que este planeta era un simple juguete de la Kábala. En cuanto se acabó la carne que chillaba, ocurrió lo mismo con nuestro interés».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋慵懒地看了卡里戈斯一眼。{/n}“我还记得，那个时候，这颗行星不过是阴谋团的玩物罢了。当这颗行星上再找不到可以尖叫的肉时，我们对它也就没了兴趣。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋慵懒地看了一眼温特斯凯尔。{/n}“我还记得，那个时候，这颗行星不过是阴谋团的玩物罢了。当这颗行星上再找不到可以尖叫的肉时，我们对它也就没了兴趣。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lance un regard nonchalant à Calligos.{/n} « Je me souviens de l'époque où cette planète n'était rien de plus qu'un terrain de jeu pour les Kabales. Notre intérêt pour elle s'est envolé le jour où elle s'est retrouvée vide de viande pleurnicharde. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lance un regard nonchalant à Winterscale.{/n} « Je me souviens de l'époque où cette planète n'était rien de plus qu'un terrain de jeu pour la Kabale. Notre intérêt pour elle s'est envolé le jour où elle s'est retrouvée vide de viande pleurnicharde. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはカリゴスに気だるげな視線を送る。{/n}「この星が陰謀団にとって娯楽に過ぎなかった時代を思い出すな。この星が泣き叫ぶ肉を使い果たした時、俺たちの興味も尽きた」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはカリゴスに気だるげな視線を送る。{/n}「この星が陰謀団にとって娯楽に過ぎなかった時代を思い出すな。この星が泣き叫ぶ肉を使い果たした時、俺たちの興味も尽きた」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt Calligos träge an.{/n} "Ich weiß noch, wie dieser Planet nichts weiter war als ein Quell der Belustigung für die Kabale. Irgendwann ging dem Planeten das quietschende Fleisch aus, da haben wir das Interesse verloren."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt Winterzunder träge an.{/n} "Ich weiß noch, wie dieser Planet nichts weiter war als ein Spielzeug der Kabale. Irgendwann ging dem Planeten das quietschende Fleisch aus, da haben wir das Interesse verloren."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, Calligos'a miskin bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bu gezegenin Kaballar için bir eğlence kaynağından başka bir şey olmadığı zamanları hatırlıyorum. Ciyaklayan etlerin kaynağı kesildiğinde bizim ilgimiz de kesilmişti."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives Calligos a lazy look.{/n} "I remember the times when this planet was nothing more than a source of amusement for the Kabals. When its supply of squealing meat ran dry, so did our interest."
